tasks.label: Build Airlines System
args: call "D:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\VC\Auxiliary\Build\vcvars64.bat" && cl.exe /EHsc *.cpp /I"C:\Program Files\MySQL\MySQL Connector C++ 9.4\include\jdbc" /I"C:\Users\anesh\vcpkg\installed\x64-windows\include" /link /LIBPATH:"C:\Program Files\MySQL\MySQL Connector C++ 9.4\lib64\vs14" /LIBPATH:"C:\Users\anesh\vcpkg\installed\x64-windows\lib" mysqlcppconn.lib icuuc.lib icuin.lib icudt.lib odbc32.lib
